title: National debt in the US in relation to gross domestic product ( GDP ) 2024
yAxis: National debt in relation to GDP
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing National debt in relation to GDP, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2024 to 2018.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2016.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2014.
gold: The statistic shows the national debt of the United States from 2014 to 2018 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) , with projections up until 2024 . In 2018 , the national debt of the United States was at around 104.26 percent of the gross domestic product . See the US GDP for further information .
